channel.title: Is There a Point?
channel.description:
Is there a point in upgrading this system for gaming?
Intel Core i5-2500k Gigabyte Z68X-UD3H-B3 Rev 1.3 Sapphire Radeon 7950 1000 MHz Lite-On DVDRW LH-20A1S WD Caviar Blue 250GB Hard Drive (had one lying around) Corsair Carbide 500R PC Power and Cooling 950W (don't ask; my urge was high back then) Mushkin Enhanced Chronos 120GB SSD Crucial Ballistix sport 2x4GB
or should I wait for Haswell next year? I wish I had waited a month for the GTX 670 before building this, lol.

item.title: Is There a Point?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Then why make a thread about an issue like this? You’re asking if there is any point in upgrading your machine. You got your answer, which is no. No need to add extra dots to your sentences to make it sound like you’re being sarcastic yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Is There a Point?
item.dc:creator: @azeem40 azeem40
item.description:
@azeem40 wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:4, topic:448906”][quote author=azeem40 link=topic=551801.msg4043316#msg4043316 date=1341853706]

if you think you’ll need to upgrade that machine within the next 3 years you are seriously delusional

Thanks for the input…
[/quote]

ok I’m sorry, yes you should upgrade and waste your money buying a card that will give an insignificant graphical boost/cpu that will give absolutely no performance difference in games and a very minor difference for everything else[/quote]Sarcasm doesn’t work on me. I never said I want to upgrade.

Read full topic

item.title: Is There a Point?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

the only reason i upgraded my card since 2006 was because it got damaged… (and i wanted to jizz @ bf3 gfx)

Read full topic

item.title: Is There a Point?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“azeem40, post:3, topic:448906”][quote author=Niall link=topic=551801.msg4043207#msg4043207 date=1341844677]
if you think you’ll need to upgrade that machine within the next 3 years you are seriously delusional
[/quote]
Thanks for the input…[/quote]

ok I’m sorry, yes you should upgrade and waste your money buying a card that will give an insignificant graphical boost/cpu that will give absolutely no performance difference in games and a very minor difference for everything else

Read full topic

Is there a point in upgrading this system for gaming?

Gigabyte Z68X-UD3H-B3 Rev 1.3
Sapphire Radeon 7950 1000 MHz

Crucial Ballistix sport 2x4GB

or should I wait for Haswell next year? I wish I had waited a month for the GTX 670 before building this, lol.
